Government Tender Announcement: Virtual Management Training

**Contract Title**
Virtual Management Training

**Contract Reference**
PW-22-01003667

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Publication Date**
2022-08-08

**Tender Closing Date**
2022-09-22T14:00:00

**Cancellation Date**
2022-01-06

**Bid Solicitation Number**
1000411342

**Cancellation of Previous Bid Solicitation**
The bid solicitation 1000411342 cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 1000379688.

**Contract Description**
The Canada Revenue Agency intends to enter into a contract with a single contractor for the Virtual Management Training Program on an as-and-when-requested basis. The contract will contain irrevocable options to extend the term of the Contract by up to two (2) 3-month periods under the same conditions. The proposed period of contract shall be from contract award to December 31, 2023.

**Evaluation Criteria**

* The responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for award of a contract.
* Proposal documents and supporting information must be submitted in either English or French.

**Eligibility Requirements**
This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including but not limited to, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others.

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open bidding

**Regions of Opportunity**
World

**Converter Languages**
English / French

**Regions of Delivery**
Canada

**Services Required**
Virtual management training program

**Method of Response**
Bids must be submitted through the Canada Post Corporation's Connect service

**Duration of Contract**
From contract award to December 31, 2023

**Documents Available**
Various attachments are available, including amendments to the original bid solicitation and supporting information.
